title: Regulation: Manual of Airworthiness Maintenance – Documentation (MAM-D)

sections.heading: Summary
sections.content:
Daily digest of official releases touching Scottish and wider UK aviation activity:
- **Regulation: Manual of Airworthiness Maintenance – Documentation (MAM-D)** — The MAM-D is a comprehensive list of Defence Aviation Environment engineering documentation, processes and Instructions for Use.
- **100 new jobs created as drone factory opens in Swindon** — Factory will build next-generation uncrewed systems and loitering munitions.
- **Guidance: Chickerell firing times** — Warning notice of firing at Chickerell range.
